channel.title: Forum Of Lies: 2nd Game (BD & Fool Win!)
channel.description:
##Welcome
**Timer** https://www.piliapp.com/timer/countdown/
**Rules**
1. Follow the [Global Forum Rules](http://forum.imperium42.com/t/global-forum-rules-please-read-first/244) 2. Don't be a dick 3. Don't be inactive 4. Do not quote/screenshot private host messages 5. Don't throw the game (from Rule #1) 6. If you don't plan to play don't join
**Gameplay** Days will be 4 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 2 IRL days long Actions are done by messaging me Black Rose/Cult will talk through a special Discord server Priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server All classes will be used, and will be used as they are found in the [Class Cards Thread](http://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-cards-for-forum-based-tol/249) When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it when you want to whisper to someone tell me what you are going to whisper and what powers you are using such as the butler's whisper **Executions** To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" When someone is on Trial they will be able to post a 1000 character defense through me, during this time no-one should post, everyone will then vote Guilty or innocent by messaging me After the votes are revealed, the King has 24 hours to choose to allow or veto the vote, if the king does not respond the vote is allowed Executions end the Day Trials pause the counter
**After The Night** You will be told what happened to you >**Night:** You slept peacefully Someone occupied your night For whatever reason, you instead visited [x] Someone tried to occupy you but you had no time for them You were attacked but you survived You were unfortunately killed Your attempt to kill your target failed Your attempt to occupy your target failed **Day:** You were bewildered Your ability backfired (Pants on Fire/Dark Rune) You've been intimidated You were exposed to deadly nightshade! A mercenary has offered you a contract, do you accept? You've been slapped and cannot vote You've been threatened
**Journals** Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
**To Join** To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
**Rolelist:** **King** **[color=purple]Mastermind[/color]/[color=darkred]Cult Leader[/color]** **[color=purple]Assassin[/color]/[color=darkred]Random Cult[/color]** **[color=steblue]Prince[/color]** **[color=steblue]Sheriff/Paladin[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Support[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Investigator[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Social[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=grey]Posseessor[/color]** **[color=grey]Random Neutral[/color]** **[color=Black]Any[/color]**
Players: Bold are people who have confirmed their role to me **1. Queen_Alfa** [color=steblue]The Princess[/color] **Killed by** [color=darkred]The Cult Leader[/color] **2. JammySplodge** [color=darkred]The Cult Leader[/color] **Killed by** [color=steblue]The Prince[/color] **3. Damafaud** **4. orangeandblack5** [color=darkred]The Invoker[/color] **Killed by** [color=darkred]The Cult Leader[/color] **and** [color=steblue]The Paladin[/color] **5. PolikShadowbliss** [color=darkred]The Cult Leader[/color] **Killed by** [color=darkblue]The Possessor[/color] **6. Rogue** [color=steblue]The Court Wizard[/color] **Killed by** [color=darkblue]The Possessor[/color] **7. Hippoltus** [color=hotpink]The Fool[/color] **executed for treason** **8. PokemonKidRyan** **9. TheGamateers (King)** **10. Tardispaten** [color=darkred]The Cult Leader[/color] **Killed by** [color=steblue]The Prince[/color] **11. _AfterTech** [color=darkblue]The Possessor[/color] **executed for treason** **12. yauaustin202** [color=steblue]The Paladin[/color] **Killed by** [color=darkred]The Cult Leader[/color] **13. Jordarrian** [color=steblue]The Observer[/color] **Killed by** [color=darkblue]The Possessor[/color] **14. Deadfrien** **15. Frostwolf103**

item.title: Forum Of Lies: 2nd Game (BD & Fool Win!)
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
Stop posting in dead threads for no reason you muffin. That will encourage the Mods to lock all the old threads so if any of these threads ever become relevant again we cannot post in them. It is not funny nor “triggering” it is just a mild inconvenience to both those who want to scan the homepage for current discussions and those who may want to post in an old thread for a good reason. Stop.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum Of Lies: 2nd Game (BD & Fool Win!)
item.dc:creator: PokemonKidRyan
item.description:
I don’t think it was that…
We were active enough to get claims in and start to work together for solving.
If we didn’t, we’d have had a good chance of losing
Also, we had some good roles, it could just as easily be that there is a game with worse roles.

Read full topic
item.source: Forum Of Lies: 2nd Game (BD & Fool Win!)

item.title: Forum Of Lies: 2nd Game (BD & Fool Win!)

item.description:
All things considered, I think I’m about ready to call BD overpowered here due to the extreme ease of confirming yourself.

Read full topic
item.source: Forum Of Lies: 2nd Game (BD & Fool Win!)

item.title: Forum Of Lies: 2nd Game (BD & Fool Win!)
item.dc:creator: PokemonKidRyan
item.description:
Also, I was pretty active and gamesolved.
So, it wouldn’t have gone much different anyway if at all xD
Converting tardis was a very clever play, but since I caught you before Jammy, I always considered that you did that to make me make a mistake, meaning it voided itself

Read full topic
